question: some people sat that modern innovations bring a lot more problem than benefit, do you agree or disagree?
text: It is argued by individuals that new transformations will lead to more difficulties than advantages. In my opinion, I totally disagree with the above statement that coming alteration will come up with new challenges which is hard to face.

To embark on, that people are coming up with new ideas which are making progress and making our life easy and exciting. New ideas will definitely bring a change to a future and create a new era of technology. Most of the innovations are made in technology, which is variable and keeps on changing time to time. For example, technology in a mobile phone is changing very fast, Earlier people use keypad phone which are  not being longer and people know are friendly with a touch screen phone which is because of innovation made in hand gadgets.

Innovation has made our life easy, Now you can see that problem to any question is solved so quickly in seconds that we need not to wait for hours or days. The revolution makes the work so  fast in the industries that help in the production on time. Because of the alteration, We are able to meet the demand of the people, as in past the production was very slow and require a lot more to produce a finished good, but changes made in machines and the workforce made it possible to achieve the demand  on time.
So, I would conclude that bringing new innovation will absolutely benefit the world and will make our work fast and perfect.
